sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Settings as SettingsIcon, Database, User, Bell, Shield, Download } from 'lucide-react'; const Settings = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('general'); const [settings, setSettings] = useState({ companyName: 'Lead Manager', email: 'admin@leadmanager.com', timezone: 'UTC', dateFormat: 'MM/DD/YYYY', notifications: { email: true, browser: true, slack: false }, exportSettings: { includeNotes: true, includeTags: true, includeQualityScores: true } }); const tabs = [ { id: 'general', name: 'General', icon: SettingsIcon }, { id: 'database', name: 'Database', icon: Database }, { id: 'notifications', name: 'Notifications', icon: Bell }, { id: 'export', name: 'Export', icon: Download }, { id: 'security', name: 'Security', icon: Shield } ]; const handleSettingChange = (key, value) => { setSettings(prev => ({ ...prev, [key]: value })); }; const handleNotificationChange = (key, value) => { setSettings(prev => ({ ...prev, notifications: { ...prev.notifications, [key]: value } })); }; const handleExportSettingChange = (key, value) => { setSettings(prev => ({ ...prev, exportSettings: { ...prev.exportSettings, [key]: value } })); }; const renderGeneralSettings = () => (

Company Information

handleSettingChange('companyName', e.target.value)} className="input" />
handleSettingChange('email', e.target.value)} className="input" />

Display Preferences

); const renderDatabaseSettings = () => (

Database Configuration

Connected

Data Management

Backup Database

Create a backup of your current database

Clean Invalid Data

Remove invalid emails and low-quality leads

Optimize Database

Optimize database performance and indexes

); const renderNotificationSettings = () => (

Notification Preferences

Email Notifications

Receive notifications via email

Browser Notifications

Show notifications in your browser

Slack Integration

Send notifications to Slack

Notification Events

{[ 'New lead added', 'Lead status changed', 'Quality score updated', 'Export completed', 'Database backup finished', 'System errors' ].map((event, index) => (
))}
); const renderExportSettings = () => (

Export Configuration

Include Notes

Export lead notes and comments

Include Tags

Export lead tags and categories

Include Quality Scores

Export lead quality and validation scores

Default Export Format

{['CSV', 'Excel', 'JSON'].map((format, index) => (
))}
); const renderSecuritySettings = () => (

Security Settings

Change Password

Update your account password

Two-Factor Authentication

Enable 2FA for additional security

API Keys

Manage API access keys

Data Privacy

Data Retention

Automatically delete old data

Data Encryption

Encrypt sensitive data at rest

Enabled
); const renderTabContent = () => { switch (activeTab) { case 'general': return renderGeneralSettings(); case 'database': return renderDatabaseSettings(); case 'notifications': return renderNotificationSettings(); case 'export': return renderExportSettings(); case 'security': return renderSecuritySettings(); default: return renderGeneralSettings(); } }; return (

Settings

Configure your dashboard and system preferences

{/* Sidebar Navigation */}
{tabs.map((tab) => { const Icon = tab.icon; return ( ); })}
{/* Main Content */}
{renderTabContent()} {/* Save Button */}
); }; export default Settings;
